A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Last Jedi left me feeling angry\, disappointed and actually depressed.  I felt the same as I did and I watched Isis destroying ancient statues in the museum with sledgehammers.

Star Wars is special and unique and I felt all the history and legacy was just razed to the ground.  Everything special about it thrown away and turned into a meaningless empty spectacle with plenty of flashes and bangs.  It seemed to be wearing its nonsensical and illogical plot as a badge of pride.  Same also with the trashing of Luke skywalker at the Jedi tradition and legacy.

The greatest hero of the universe gets given a physical beating by some girl so Luke is left cowering on the floor as Ray menaces him with her lightsaber.

I find I was very creepy political propaganda throughout\, unregulated\, with no mandate\, very creepy indeed.

Like some dumb schmo I've just realised the gross milk drinking scene was of course anti-milk drinking propaganda.

I will never forget what they did to my treasured and beloved heroes and legacy of the Star Wars universe.
